Name: Gram: āy-, āt
Description: CHANGE-OF-STATE (vector verb for starting of an action)

Name: Gram: šut
Description: CHANGE-OF-STATE (vector verb for initiating an action)

Name: Gram: yé
Description: COMPLETIVE predicative marker in TRANSITIVE constructions

Name: Gram: bóló
Description: under the responsibility of', 'in the personal sphere of' (postposition)

Name: Gram: à tìgî
Description: emphatic third person PRONOUN ('the person in question')

Name: Gram: ɲíní
Description: IMMINENCE aux 'come close to, be about to'

Name: Gram: (i=)kna
Description: adverbial INTENSIFIER (for predicate or entire phrase)

Name: Gram: eːn
Description: DISCOURSE marker (for the end of discursive unit in narratives and poetry)

Name: Gram: vowel change in stem (low back V to high front V)
Gram: paṛnā
Description: constraining OBLIGATION ('be obliged to, have to')

Name: Gram: veder-si (+V)
Description: PASSIVE (+ PAST.PARTICIPLE/INF) (e.g., si vide. RFL see.PST.3SG/si videro RFL see.PST.3PL)

Name: Gram: ɲɯ-
Description: SENSORY prefix (EVIDENTIAL: knowledge mediated through observation or second hand)

Name: Gram: mɔ̀:k
Description: preposition indicating DIRECTION to GOAL near speaker

Name: Gram: cikyeng
Description: NOMINALIZER (state of x [undesirable situation]), mermaid construction

Name: Gram: bǎ < 把 >
Description: coverb, CAUSATIVE marker, disposal marker, etc.

Name: Gram: shì < 是 >
Description: COPULA (& FOCUS marker, verbal anaphor 'be so')

Name: Gram: shàng < 上 >
Description: postposition or relational noun (for time/space marking)

Name: Gram: -lá
Description: non-finite verbal suffix (COMPLEMENTIZER of MODAL verbs)

Name: Gram: kó
Description: saying that', 'under the pretext that', 'on the ground that' (quotative subordinator)

Name: Gram: ondae
Description: associative PLURAL marker (with personal names and kin terms)

Name: Gram: =e
Description: “ezâfe” (clitic linking head noun to depending elements)

Name: Gram: =o (+ să)
Description: FUTURE (spoken and informal registers) (+ subjunctive complementizer)

Name: Gram: se
Description: marker of the lack of control of the subject

Name: Gram: pen
Description: preposition/coverb meaning 'in the function of, as'

Name: Gram: maa
Description: Coverb/preposition indicating DIRECTION to GOAL near speaker

Name: Gram: paj
Description: preposition (indication DIRECTION to GOAL away from speaker)

Name: Gram: àtìsà
Description: HABITUAL aux ('do something often, or in great quantity')

Name: Gram: ńtsé
Description: do something continually', or 'be still doing something'

Name: Gram: díkílé
Description: have done something in the PAST year' [PAST aux]

Name: Gram: létsɩ́
Description: have done something the day before' [RECENT PAST aux]

Name: Gram: sàlɩ́
Description: have done something long ago, or for the last time'

Name: Gram: tɬàà-díká
Description: do something during the next year'

Name: Gram: tɬàà-lálá
Description: do something before the end of the day'

Name: Gram: tsʊ́χílé
Description: have done something in the morning'

Name: Gram: bàtɬà
Description: IMMINENCE aux ('seem to be about to do something')

Name: Gram: lʊ̀sètsà
Description: IMMINENCE aux ('seem to be about to do something')

Name: Gram: tsìlé
Description: seem to be close to do something'

Name: Gram: o
Description: “ezâfe” (clitic linking head noun to depending elements)
